description: XPhos - Excellent for electron-deficient aryl halides
notes: Highly effective for challenging substrates with electron-withdrawing groups

description: SPhos - Good balance of activity and selectivity
notes: Excellent general-purpose ligand with broad substrate scope

description: BrettPhos - Highly active for challenging substrates
notes: Exceptional for sterically demanding transformations

description: tBuXPhos - Sterically demanding for selective reactions
notes: Highly selective for challenging coupling reactions

description: RuPhos - Versatile bulky phosphine for various applications
notes: Versatile ligand for multiple reaction types

description: DavePhos - Moderate bulk for general applications
notes: Good balance of activity and cost-effectiveness

description: JohnPhos - Simple and effective monodentate phosphine
notes: Reliable and cost-effective for standard reactions

description: CyJohnPhos - Cyclohexyl variant with enhanced properties
notes: Enhanced version of JohnPhos with better performance

description: DPPF - Versatile bidentate ligand with good bite angle
notes: Excellent bidentate ligand with optimal bite angle

description: DPPP - Flexible bidentate phosphine
notes: Flexible linker allows conformational adaptation

description: DPPE - Rigid bidentate phosphine
notes: Rigid structure provides defined coordination geometry

description: BINAP - Chiral bidentate ligand for asymmetric synthesis
notes: Premier chiral ligand for enantioselective transformations

description: Xantphos - Wide bite angle bidentate ligand
notes: Wide bite angle enhances certain transformations

description: PPh3 - Simple and widely available monodentate phosphine
notes: Most basic and widely available phosphine ligand

description: P(o-tolyl)3 - Moderate steric bulk simple phosphine
notes: Good compromise between steric bulk and reactivity

description: PCy3 - Highly electron-rich simple phosphine
notes: Highly electron-donating for electron-poor substrates

description: Phenanthroline - Nitrogen-based bidentate ligand
notes: Classic nitrogen ligand for specific metal coordination

description: Bipyridine - Versatile nitrogen bidentate ligand
notes: Versatile nitrogen ligand with good coordination properties

description: Ethylenediamine - Simple nitrogen bidentate ligand
notes: Simple and inexpensive nitrogen ligand

description: IPr - Bulky N-heterocyclic carbene ligand
notes: Highly active NHC ligand for challenging transformations

description: IMes - Moderately bulky N-heterocyclic carbene
notes: Standard NHC ligand with good general performance

description: SIPr - Saturated N-heterocyclic carbene variant
